description.zh-cn: 战国末期卫国人，著名刺客。受燕太子丹之托入刺秦王政，失败被杀。
description.en: A native of the State of Wei and a famous assassin during the late Warring States period. He was entrusted by Crown Prince Dan of Yan to assassinate King Zheng of Qin, but failed and was killed.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期秦国君主，后来的中国第一位皇帝。他是荆轲的刺杀目标。
description.en: The ruler of the State of Qin during the late Warring States period and later the first emperor of a unified China. He was the target of Jing Ke's assassination attempt.

description.zh-cn: 燕国太子，为抵抗秦国的吞并，策划了荆轲刺秦王的行动。
description.en: The crown prince of the State of Yan. To resist the annexation by the State of Qin, he planned the assassination of King Zheng of Qin by Jing Ke.

description.zh-cn: 燕国游侠，向太子丹推荐了荆轲，后为表明自己严守秘密而自刎。
description.en: A knight-errant of the State of Yan who recommended Jing Ke to Crown Prince Dan. He later committed suicide to prove his discretion.

description.zh-cn: 原秦国将领，后逃亡至燕国。为助荆轲成事，自刎献出首级。
description.en: A former general of the State of Qin who fled to the State of Yan. To help Jing Ke's mission succeed, he committed suicide and offered his head.

description.zh-cn: 燕国人，擅长击筑，是荆轲的知己。
description.en: A native of the State of Yan, skilled at playing the zhu (a string instrument), and a close friend of Jing Ke.

description.zh-cn: 燕国勇士，被指定为荆轲刺秦的副手。
description.en: A warrior from the State of Yan, appointed as Jing Ke's deputy in the assassination mission.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政的侍医，在荆轲行刺时用药囊投掷荆轲，为秦王争取了时间。
description.en: King Zheng of Qin's court physician. During Jing Ke's assassination attempt, he threw his medicine bag at Jing Ke, buying time for the king.

description.zh-cn: 战国末年剑术家，曾与荆轲论剑，二人不欢而散。
description.en: A swordsman from the late Warring States period who once discussed swordsmanship with Jing Ke, leading to a disagreement.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期人物，曾在邯郸与荆轲发生争执。
description.en: A figure from the Warring States period who had a dispute with Jing Ke in Handan.

description.zh-cn: 赵国铸剑名匠（姓徐，名夫人，为男性），为荆轲铸造了淬毒的匕首。
description.en: A famous male sword-maker from the State of Zhao (surname Xu, given name Furen) who forged the poison-laced dagger for Jing Ke.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期卫国君主。荆轲曾游说他但未被任用。
description.en: The ruler of the State of Wei during the Warring States period. Jing Ke once tried to advise him but was not employed.

description.zh-cn: 西汉史学家，在《史记》中记载了荆轲刺秦的故事。
description.en: A historian of the Western Han dynasty who recorded the story of Jing Ke's assassination attempt in the 'Records of the Grand Historian'.

description.zh-cn: 宋代政治家、史学家，对荆轲刺秦的行为持批判态度。
description.en: A politician and historian of the Song dynasty who held a critical view of Jing Ke's assassination attempt.

description.zh-cn: 东晋诗人，作有《咏荆轲》一诗赞颂其事迹。
description.en: A poet of the Eastern Jin dynasty who wrote the poem 'Ode to Jing Ke' praising his deeds.

description.zh-cn: 唐代诗人，其作品《于易水送人》与荆轲的典故相关。
description.en: A poet of the Tang dynasty whose work 'Seeing a Friend Off at the Yi River' alludes to the story of Jing Ke.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝的一个诸侯国，为抵抗秦国而策划了刺秦行动。
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou dynasty in China, which planned the assassination of the King of Qin to resist annexation.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝的一个诸侯国，在战国末期发动统一战争，是燕国等国的主要威胁。
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou dynasty in China, which launched wars of unification in the late Warring States period and was the main threat to states like Yan.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝的一个诸侯国，荆轲的故国。
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou dynasty in China, the home state of Jing Ke.

zh-cn: 史记·卷八十六·刺客列传·第二十六

description.zh-cn: 由西汉史学家司马迁撰写的纪传体史书，是记载荆轲事迹的主要文献来源。
description.en: A monumental history of ancient China finished around 94 BC by the Western Han dynasty historian Sima Qian. It is the main literary source for the story of Jing Ke.

description.zh-cn: 秦国在战国末期的杰出将领。
description.en: An outstanding general of the State of Qin during the late Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 秦国在战国末期的将领。
description.en: A general of the State of Qin during the late Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 燕太子丹委托荆轲执行刺杀秦王政的任务，并尊其为上卿，予以厚待。
description.en: Crown Prince Dan of Yan entrusted Jing Ke with the mission to assassinate King Zheng of Qin, honored him as a high-ranking minister, and treated him generously.

description.zh-cn: 田光向燕太子丹推荐了荆轲来执行刺秦任务。
description.en: Tian Guang recommended Jing Ke to Crown Prince Dan of Yan to carry out the assassination mission against Qin.

description.zh-cn: 燕国游侠田光结识荆轲，认为他不是平常人。
description.en: The knight-errant Tian Guang of Yan became acquainted with Jing Ke and considered him an extraordinary person.

description.zh-cn: 燕太子丹要求田光对计划保密，田光认为这是不信任的表现，遂自刎以证清白，确保计划不会泄露。
description.en: Crown Prince Dan of Yan asked Tian Guang to keep the plan secret. Tian Guang interpreted this as a sign of distrust and committed suicide to prove his integrity and ensure the plan would not be leaked.

description.zh-cn: 荆轲说服樊於期自刎，以其首级作为取信秦王政的信物。
description.en: Jing Ke persuaded Fan Yuqi to commit suicide so that his head could be used as a token to gain the trust of King Zheng of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 樊於期为帮助荆轲完成刺秦计划并报自己的家仇，毅然自刎献出首级。
description.en: To help Jing Ke complete the assassination plot and to avenge his own family, Fan Yuqi resolutely committed suicide and offered his head.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政杀害了樊於期的父母宗族，并悬赏千金邑万家要其首级。
description.en: King Zheng of Qin had Fan Yuqi's parents and clan executed and offered a bounty of a thousand catties of gold and a city of ten thousand households for his head.

description.zh-cn: 铸剑名匠徐夫人为荆轲铸造了淬有剧毒的匕首用于刺秦。
description.en: The master swordsmith Xu Furen forged a poison-laced dagger for Jing Ke to use in the assassination.

description.zh-cn: 秦舞阳被指定为荆轲的副手，一同前往秦国执行刺杀任务。
description.en: Qin Wuyang was appointed as Jing Ke's deputy to travel to the State of Qin and carry out the assassination mission together.

description.zh-cn: 荆轲与擅长击筑的高渐离在燕国结为知己，经常一同饮酒悲歌。
description.en: Jing Ke and Gao Jianli, who was skilled at playing the zhu, became close friends in the State of Yan, often drinking and singing sorrowful songs together.

description.zh-cn: 荆轲在榆次与盖聂论剑，因话不投机，盖聂怒目而视，二人不欢而散。
description.en: In Yuci, Jing Ke discussed swordsmanship with Gai Nie. Due to a disagreement, Gai Nie stared at him angrily, and they parted on bad terms.

description.zh-cn: 荆轲在邯郸与鲁勾践争道，被其怒斥后默默离开。
description.en: In Handan, Jing Ke had a dispute over the right of way with Lu Goujian, who angrily rebuked him, causing Jing Ke to leave quietly.

description.zh-cn: 荆轲在秦国朝堂上图穷匕见，行刺秦王政，但未能成功。
description.en: In the Qin court, Jing Ke attempted to assassinate King Zheng of Qin when the dagger was revealed from the map scroll, but he failed.

description.zh-cn: 在刺杀失败后，秦王政反击并当场杀死了荆轲。
description.en: After the assassination attempt failed, King Zheng of Qin fought back and killed Jing Ke on the spot.

description.zh-cn: 在荆轲追击秦王时，侍医夏无且用随身的药囊投掷荆轲，延缓其行动，为秦王拔剑反击争取了时间。
description.en: As Jing Ke was chasing the king, the court physician Xia Wuju threw his medicine bag at Jing Ke, slowing him down and buying time for the king to draw his sword and counterattack.

description.zh-cn: 燕太子丹因畏惧秦国将吞并燕国，策划了刺杀秦王政的行动以求自保。
description.en: Fearing that the State of Qin would annex Yan, Crown Prince Dan of Yan planned the assassination of King Zheng of Qin as an act of self-preservation.

description.zh-cn: 秦国在灭韩、攻赵之后，即将攻打燕国，对燕国构成严重军事威胁。
description.en: After conquering Han and attacking Zhao, the State of Qin was poised to attack the State of Yan, posing a serious military threat to it.

description.zh-cn: 荆轲曾游说卫元君，但其主张未被采纳任用。
description.en: Jing Ke once tried to advise Lord Yuan of Wei, but his proposals were not accepted, and he was not employed.

description.zh-cn: 司马迁在《史记·刺客列传》中详细记载了荆轲的事迹，使其形象和故事得以流传后世。
description.en: Sima Qian recorded the deeds of Jing Ke in detail in the 'Biographies of Assassins' chapter of the 'Records of the Grand Historian', allowing his image and story to be passed down through generations.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝的司马光在《资治通鉴》中批评荆轲刺秦是“愚”和“不可谓之义”的行为。
description.en: Sima Guang of the Song dynasty criticized Jing Ke's assassination attempt in his 'Zizhi Tongjian' as 'foolish' and 'not righteous'.

description.zh-cn: 东晋诗人陶渊明创作《咏荆轲》，对荆轲的行为予以赞颂。
description.en: The Eastern Jin poet Tao Yuanming wrote 'Ode to Jing Ke', praising Jing Ke's actions.

description.zh-cn: 唐代诗人骆宾王创作《于易水送人》，诗中“昔时人已没，今日水犹寒”的诗句怀念荆轲。
description.en: The Tang dynasty poet Luo Binwang wrote 'Seeing a Friend Off at the Yi River', in which the lines 'The man of old is gone, today the water is still cold' commemorate Jing Ke.

description.zh-cn: 王翦是秦王政手下攻打赵国等地的主要将领之一。
description.en: Wang Jian was one of the main generals under King Zheng of Qin responsible for attacking states like Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 李信是秦王政手下攻打赵国等地的将领之一。
description.en: Li Xin was one of the generals under King Zheng of Qin who attacked areas such as the state of Zhao.
